text.div:
Generated Narrative: Requirements IMMZFXNREQ001

Profile: SGRequirements

extension.valueString: The EIR system to be able to communicate with other systems (such as a national health management information system [HMIS] and Expanded Programme on Immunization [EPI]) to obtain vaccination locations information and other necessary information
I will know about new vaccination locations and be informed about any updated information

The EIR system to be able to communicate with other systems (such as a national health management information system [HMIS] and Expanded Programme on Immunization [EPI]) to obtain vaccination locations information and other necessary information

The EIR system to be able to communicate with other systems (such as a national health management information system [HMIS] and Expanded Programme on Immunization [EPI]) to obtain vaccination locations information and other necessary information

extension.valueMarkdown: As a Electronic immunization registry (EIR) staff, I want: >The EIR system to be able to communicate with other systems (such as a national health management information system [HMIS] and Expanded Programme on Immunization [EPI]) to obtain vaccination locations information and other necessary information so that >I will know about new vaccination locations and be informed about any updated information
